name: Channeler
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Magic by bloodline

  • Draw on yourself for power

  • Spellshaping, but not just physical

WEAPONS

  • light, common, no armor or helms

  • Can innately enchant wielded weapons?

ENGAGEMENT

  • none

ABILITIES:

  • Aggressive and enchantment, altering self in non-animal ways

  • Can add/remove targets/range/shape of AoE, etc. (reduce one to increase another)

  • [look at 0.1 evoker class]

  • HERE LIES FIREBALL

  • Not quite counterspell, but reactions that can oppose magic with magic, maybe a magical equivalent to riposte.
